mapper.select: SELECT A.*, I.IMG_NAME, I.EXT FROM ARTIST AS A LEFT JOIN IMG AS I ON A.ARTIST_SEQ = I.SEQ WHERE A.ARTIST_NAME LIKE #{artist}
SELECT MUSIC_SEQ 'MUSICSEQ', MUSIC_TITLE 'MUSICTITLE' FROM MUSIC WHERE ARTIST_SEQ LIKE #{artistSeq}

SELECT B.ALBUM_SEQ, B.ALBUM_TYPE, B.ALBUM_TITLE, B.RELEASE_DATE, I.IMG_NAME, I.EXT FROM ALBUM AS B JOIN IMG AS I ON B.ALBUM_SEQ = I.SEQ WHERE B.ALBUM_SEQ IN( SELECT M.ALBUM_SEQ FROM MUSIC M WHERE M.ARTIST_SEQ LIKE #{artistSeq} )
SELECT M.MV_SEQ, M.MV_TITLE, M.RELEASE_DATE, M.MUSIC_SEQ, M.ytb FROM MV AS M WHERE M.MUSIC_SEQ IN( SELECT MC.MUSIC_SEQ FROM MUSIC MC WHERE MC.ARTIST_SEQ LIKE #{artistSeq} )
